1.16.5.1.1.4a: fix issues that caused event data to be lost between world reloads and respawns, and zombie players to not convert properly
1.16.5.1.1.4b: fix crash when spawning player zombies and drowned players on servers
1.16.5.1.1.5: general fixes and more configurable tweaks
1.16.5.1.1.5a: fix crash on servers when a player is offline
1.16.5.1.1.5b: fix incompatibility with some mods that change respawning
1.16.5.1.1.5c: fix crashes caused by a null pointer exception with zombie players and conversions
